summary: An ordinance accepting condemnation awards for the acquisition of the necessary property and property rights for a sewer right-of-way across certain tracts in Section 10, Township 25 North, Range 3 East, W. M., under Ordinance No. 77831, as amended by Ordinance No. 79203, King County Superior Court Cause No. 426001, and making an appropriation from the Seattle Sewer Bonds 1946 Fund in connection therewith.
